column2: "Na Moses nye Israelmba no toow ndwom yi maa EWURADZE
column3: na wɔkaa dɛ
column5: osiandɛ ɔama noho do enyimnyam mu: Ɔpɔnkɔ nye no do tsefo no ɔatow hɔn egu po mu."

column3: Na ɔabɛyɛ mo nkwagye: Oyi nye me Nyankopɔn
column4: na mibeyi no ayɛw; M’egya ne Nyankopɔn a

column2: "EWURADZE yɛ ɔsabarimba: EWURADZE nye ne dzin."
"Farao ne ntseaseanam nye no dɔm no ɔatow hɔn egu po mu: Na n’asafohemfo a wɔasan mu eyi no wɔamemem Mbɛw Po no mu."
"Ebun akata hɔn do: Wɔamemem kɔ ase too dɛ ɔbo."

column3: wo nsa enyimfa yɛ tum mu onyimnyamfo
column5: wo nsa enyimfa dwerew ɔtamfo no."

column2: "Na w’abɔso akɛseyɛ no mu ara na edze butuw hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia wo no: Ɔwo soma w’ebufuhyew ba
column3: ɔhyew hɔn dɛ eburonan."

column2: "Na wo hwen mu ehuw mu na nsu no ano boae
column3: Nsuyirii no gyinaa bantsenn dɛ kuw: Ebun no kyekyeer wɔ po akoma mu."
Mibetsiw hɔn
column5: mebɛkyɛ asadze no mu: Wɔbɛmee me kra; Mobɔtwe m’afona

column3: epo no kataa hɔn do: Wɔmeem dɛ sumbui wɔ nsu kɛse no mu."
woana na ɔtse dɛ ɔwo
column4: wɔ enyame mu? Woana na ɔtse dɛ ɔwo

column3: Asaase meen hɔn."

column2: "Ɔwo wo mbɔbɔrhu mu na egya ɔman a apon hɔn no kwan: Ɔwo w’ahoɔdzen mu na egya hɔn akɔ wo tsenabew krɔnkrɔn no."

column3: hɔn ho rihim: Ahopopo aka hɔn a wɔtse Filistia."

column2: "Nna Edom asafohen mpanyimfo bɔɔ hu; Moab akatakyi no
column3: ahohim aka hɔn: Hɔn a wɔtse Keenan nyinara anan anan."

column2: "Nketsenketse nye suro ekitsa hɔn; W’abasa ne kɛseyɛ ntsi wɔayeyɛ dzindzinn dɛ ɔbo; Kodu dɛ wo man botwa mu
column3: EWURADZE
column4: Kodu dɛ wo man a enya hɔn no botwa mu."

column3: na abɛtsɛw hɔn wɔ w’egyapadze bepɔw no do
column6: edze ayɛ wo tsenabew no a
column9: edze wo nsa dze etsim hɔ no a."

column2: "Na Farao no mpɔnkɔ nye ne ntseaseanam na ɔnye no mpɔnkɔdofo na wɔkɔr po no mu
column3: na EWURADZE maa po no mu nsu no sanee bɛkataa hɔn do; na Israelmba no dze wɔnantseew asaase kɛsɛɛ do wɔ po ne finimfin."
Aaron n’akyerɛbaa no
column4: faa mfuaba kitsae: na mbaa no nyinara dze mfuaba na ɔnye asaw puei dzii n’ekyir."

column3: Hom ntow ndwom mma EWURADZE
column4: na oedzi konyim wɔ enyimnyam mu; Ɔpɔnkɔ nye no do tsefo no ɔatow hɔn egu po mu."

column2: "Na Moses gyaa Israel fii Mbɛw Po no ho kɔr kan
column3: na wɔkɔr Sur sar do
column4: na wɔnantseew sar no do ndaansa

column3: woenntum annom Mara nsu no bi
column4: osiandɛ ɔyɛ wen: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Mara."

column2: "Na ɔman no hwinhwiin Moses ho dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na yɛnnom?"

column2: "Na osui frɛɛ EWURADZE; na EWURADZE kyerɛɛ no dua bi
column3: na ɔtowee kyeen nsu no mu
column4: na nsu no yɛɛ dɛw. Hɔ na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn ahyɛdze nye mbra
column5: na hɔ so na ɔsɔɔ hɔn hwɛe;"

column3: Sɛ ibetsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze yie
column4: na ayɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ n’enyiwa do
column5: na ayɛ aso wɔ ne mbransɛm do
column6: na edzi n’ahyɛdze nyinara do a
column7: ɔnodze mennkɛfa yarba biara a medze megu Egyptfo do no bi megu wo do: na emi nye EWURADZE a ɔsa wo yarba no."

column3: mbrɛ nsunyiwa duebien
column4: nye mbɛdua eduosuon wɔ: na wɔkyeer nsera wɔ hɔ wɔ nsu no ho."
